testcase.name: : TC_01 Vice Dean should be able to select the start and end time for the course - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to "https://managementonschools.com/" homepage..............passed And clicks on loginIcon.....................................................passed And enters "ViceDeanYusa" in the userName input field.......................passed And enters "ViceDeanYusa1" in the password input field......................passed And clicks on Login button..................................................passed And clicks on Menu button...................................................passed And clicks on "Lesson Management" on Main Menu..............................passed And User clicks on the Lesson Program button................................passed And And User selects an education class "C#" from the provided options......passed And User chooses the educational terms "SPRING_SEMESTER" from the available list.passed And User selects a day "WEDNESDAY" from the dropdown menu...................passed And User chooses a start time "7:00AM" from the provided time slots.........passed And User selects a stop time "7:00PM" from the available time slots.........passed Then User clicks on the submit button.......................................passed And verify successful warning Pop-up message displayed......................passed And close the application...................................................passed
